text:
'Transgender Day of Visibility' Is Just One of 50+ LGBTQIA2S+ Celebrations. Many Americans may be unaware that there are more than 50 LGBTQIA2S+-themed holidays. Transgender Day of Visibility was already on the calendar before this week.
